text: Unibuke (yewe Muhamadi) ubwo Nyagasani wawe yabwiraga abamalayika ati "Mu by’ukuri, ngiye gushyira umusigire (ikiremwa muntu) ku isi". Baravuga bati "Ese urayishyiraho uzayikoreraho ubwangizi akanamena amaraso, kandi tugusingiza tukanagushimira ndetse twe tukanagutagatifuza!? Aravuga ati "Mu by’ukuri, njye nzi ibyo mutazi
